scripts.dev:backend: cross-env DEBUG=express:* npm run build && nodemon server/index.js
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.start: cross-env DEBUG=express:* npm run build && node server/index.js
